attributes.action: Extend child free holidays, due to COVID
attributes.additional_details: Due to COVID a lot of family’s have not had the opportunity to get the child free places so they can afford to go on holiday.
attributes.background: Extend the age of which you get child free places to go on holiday so family’s can have the opportunity to benefit from this service that most holiday company’s and airlines offer

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for travel companies who provide free places.
